previewArticle.title: Costa Rica vs. Greece: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Round of 16 Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Costa Rica 1(5), Greece 1(3): 2014 FIFA World Cup | Round of 16 Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Georgios Samaras (Greece) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Michael Umaña (Costa Rica).

timelineItems.name: Sportingbet Aust.
timelineItems.text: Watching the behind-the-goal camera 'ducking' behind the net after a shot will never not be funny. #WorldCup #CRCGRE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Konstantinos Katsouranis (Greece) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
Corner,  Greece. Conceded by Giancarlo Gonzalez.

timelineItems.name: Mase
timelineItems.text: If Georgios Samaras scores a #WorldCup last 16 winning goal, then we should all be very afraid. #GRE #CRC #EndOfDays

timelineItems.name: Sarah Allen
timelineItems.text: How many shots do Greece need before they're actually going to score a goal? #CRCvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kostas Mitroglou (Greece).
José Cubero (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Mark J. Westpfahl
timelineItems.text: #GRE came feet away from putting away #CRC after corner kick. Costa Rica with only 10 men really holding their own.

timelineItems.name: Amana Abdulwakeel
timelineItems.text: If futbol doesn't work out, Campbell can go into acting. His fall and tumble is on point! #CRCGRE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Randall Brenes (Costa Rica).
Giorgos Karagounis (Greece) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Galen
timelineItems.text: Can someone explain to me why #GRE is unable to score while a man up? Is #CRC just that much better?

timelineItems.name: Ben Rigby
timelineItems.text: Still backing #CRC but everyone looks knackered TBH & all subs used. #Greek goal fortuitous; even more so if goes to penalties.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Greece. José Holebas tries a through ball, but Theofanis Gekas is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Antonia Sariyska
timelineItems.text: You, guys, can doubt as much as you want, but #Greece won an entire Euro Cup on extra times and penalties ... :) #crcgre #WorldCup2014 #fb

timelineItems.name: Bruce Maduri
timelineItems.text: #Worldcup2014 #CRCGRE #CRC not attacking. Looks like with 10 men they're just trying to hold on for penalty kick opportunity. @FIFAWorldCup

timelineItems.comment: First Half Extra Time ends, Costa Rica 1, Greece 1.

timelineItems.name: Lifeblood Alchemist
timelineItems.text: My mom was skeptical about football- literally fell out of her chair at #CRC opportunity. #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Second Half Extra Time begins Costa Rica 1, Greece 1.
Attempt missed. Randall Brenes (Costa Rica) right footed shot from the right side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Joel Campbell with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: farouq™
timelineItems.text: Seems like this match is gonna head to the penalties like yesterday. #GRE have been so good. They need that little touch of finishing

timelineItems.name: TΣMΣKΔ
timelineItems.text: The #GRE wasn't active the whole game, he might be rusty for the penalty shootouts

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Keylor Navas (Costa Rica) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: OLOSHO BOI
timelineItems.text: The last team to win a #WorldCup game in extra time with a player short, was #ITA who defeated #NGA in 1994 Round of 16. #CRCvGRE [ESPN]"

timelineItems.name: Danadopoulos
timelineItems.text: Keeper playing for time, I bet when pens come he's jumping all over the place #gre #CRC

timelineItems.comment: Joel Campbell (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Konstantinos Katsouranis (Greece).
Giorgos Karagounis (Greece) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Michael Umaña (Costa Rica).
Offside, Greece. Vasilis Torosidis tries a through ball, but Georgios Samaras is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Ceres
timelineItems.text: So #GRE has three nicknames: Ethniki (National), Piratiko (Pirates / pirate ship), Galanolefki (sky blue and white)

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Giancarlo Gonzalez (Costa Rica) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Randall Brenes with a cross following a set piece situation.
Offside, Costa Rica. Celso Borges tries a through ball, but Joel Campbell is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: a simple song
timelineItems.text: The referee really hasn't done Costa Rica many favours tonight #CRCGRE

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Costa Rica. Conceded by Konstantinos Katsouranis.
Attempt saved. Lazaros Christodoulopoulos (Greece) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kostas Mitroglou.

timelineItems.name: Latin Post Sports
timelineItems.text: 112' Cubero dribbles through entire #GRE defense and crosses in for Campbell; striker misses for #CRC. Corner kick.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Giorgos Karagounis (Greece) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Sokratis.

timelineItems.name: Pirate Irwin
timelineItems.text: #WorldCup2014 #CRC #GRE Doesn't look like Costa Rica have a Paris in their ranks to hit them in the Achilles either and put us out of misery

timelineItems.name: Saurav Shrestha
timelineItems.text: Costa Rica, whatever the outcome of this match, your goalie is awesome! #crc

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Randall Brenes (Costa Rica).
Sokratis (Greece) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: LastHonestSportsFan
timelineItems.text: I don't know who it was, but a #CRC player sprinted 90 yards to take away the back post on that #GRE break. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Tejas Patel
timelineItems.text: The final ball from #GRE has been woeful. Much rather see #CRC advance. Will be a tragedy if they don't. #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Greece. Conceded by Randall Brenes.

timelineItems.name: Jack Marshall
timelineItems.text: Giancarlo González was the one sprinting back to defend. After 112 mins of International football. And in this heat. Wow. #CRC #GRE

timelineItems.name: Latin Post Sports
timelineItems.text: 116' Navas has to be the man of the match. Catches a cross with relative ease and looks completely in control. Reason why #CRC still alive

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Greece. Kostas Manolas tries a through ball, but José Holebas is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: RadioContempo
timelineItems.text: #CRC http://t.co/JNYa6BmWV5

timelineItems.name: RadioContempo
timelineItems.text: #CRC http://t.co/JNYa6BmWV5

timelineItems.name: Jude
timelineItems.text: #CRC played a good defensive game after going down 10 men

timelineItems.name: Daniel Gironda
timelineItems.text: Even if Costa Rica wins they'll go against the Netherlands with 5 starters missing, but still let's go Costa Rica. #CRC

timelineItems.name: Jason Paul ®
timelineItems.text: For one who plays up top, I feel for Campbell. Gotta be running on fumes at this point. #CRC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kostas Mitroglou (Greece) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Kostas Manolas.
Attempt missed. Lazaros Christodoulopoulos (Greece) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Giannis Maniatis.

timelineItems.name: Brett Landrum
timelineItems.text: should be a rule that if you can't score in 30' of extra time against 10 men, then you are disqualified from ever competing again. #CRCGRE

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Greece. Conceded by Johnny Acosta.
Attempt saved. Kostas Mitroglou (Greece) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Theofanis Gekas with a headed pass.
Corner,  Greece. Conceded by Keylor Navas.

timelineItems.name: Rick Patel
timelineItems.text: This game might have livened up but the dodgyness of Greece just always shines through. #CRCGRE #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Konstantinos Katsouranis (Greece).
Randall Brenes (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Second Half Extra Time ends, Costa Rica 1, Greece 1.

timelineItems.name: Laurie Hanna
timelineItems.text: Would love to see #CRC go through here - but they look like they'll struggle to get five players with energy to actually take the penalties.

timelineItems.name: Matt Alexander
timelineItems.text: Least the shootout has to be dramatic, Costa Rica deserve it for their effort #CRCGRE

timelineItems.name: Juan
timelineItems.text: This is where all of #Navas hard work comes into play. C'mon #CRC !!

timelineItems.comment: Penalty Shootout begins Costa Rica 1, Greece 1.

timelineItems.name: Jen Skordis
timelineItems.text: Why would anyone want to be the goalie? Why? #CRCvGRE

timelineItems.name: pop pup
timelineItems.text: 10 Costa Ricans were still more dangerous than 11 Greeks.:P Now I really hope Keylor Navas denies a few penalties. #CRCvGRE

timelineItems.comment: Goal!  Costa Rica 1(1), Greece 1. Celso Borges (Costa Rica) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the high centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Martin Hart #NED
timelineItems.text: #CRC have never won a penalty shootout in the #WorldCup. First time for everything! ;)

timelineItems.name: LuLu
timelineItems.text: Oh how I hate shootouts! Stressful to the max...I can't even imagine how the players are feeling! #worldcup #FIFA #CRC #GRE

timelineItems.comment: Goal!  Costa Rica 1(1), Greece 1(1). Kostas Mitroglou (Greece) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: Thomas Halliwell
timelineItems.text: Want Greece to win the penalty shoot out so Saturday night will be mental with Greece playing in the quarter finals #GRE

timelineItems.comment: Goal!  Costa Rica 1(2), Greece 1(1). Bryan Ruiz (Costa Rica) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the top right corner.
Goal!  Costa Rica 1(2), Greece 1(2). Lazaros Christodoulopoulos (Greece) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Robinet
timelineItems.text: Man that whole #CRC team is kneeling in a line and all I can think is tight hamstrings and cramps are probably going to follow.

timelineItems.comment: Goal!  Costa Rica 1(3), Greece 1(2). Giancarlo Gonzalez (Costa Rica) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
Goal!  Costa Rica 1(3), Greece 1(3). José Holebas (Greece) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Costa Rica 1(4), Greece 1(3). Joel Campbell (Costa Rica) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: Devin Serlin
timelineItems.text: Wouldn't have believed that both these teams would have scored all their penalties up to this point... #GRE #COS

timelineItems.comment: Penalty saved! Theofanis Gekas (Greece) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: Brian Katz
timelineItems.text: Wow 0 what a save by Navas #CRC #worldcup2014

timelineItems.comment: Goal!  Costa Rica 1(5), Greece 1(3). Michael Umaña (Costa Rica) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.

timelineItems.name: juan
timelineItems.text: I knew this one was Navasssss incredible!!! #crc

timelineItems.comment: Penalty Shootout ends, Costa Rica 1(5), Greece 1(3).

timelineItems.name: MLS Dispatch
timelineItems.text: #GRE showing pressure now. Good strength and passing on the left side to get the shot off. #CRCvsGRE

timelineItems.text: This has all the makings of a terrible game. #CRC 1-0 #GRE #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.text: #GRE players have turned down their WC bonuses & asked for money to be spent on new training facilities for national team. #Patriotism

timelineItems.text: #CRC have had some promising-looking counter-attacks, but can't seem to make anything of them. #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Arya
timelineItems.text: This match is closer that I thought it would be! #CRC have lost their magic?

timelineItems.text: That attack and cross from Greece was the first real moment of quality in an otherwise pedestrian first half #WorldCup #CRC #GRE

timelineItems.text: This game isn't the most action packed but it feels like its going by so quick. #CRC #GRE
